import React, {Component} from 'react' import classes from './TaskDetail.module.css' import { Map, Marker, Popup, TileLayer } from 'react-leaflet' import './map.css' import LocationItem from './LocationItem' class Locations extends Component{ render(){ const position = [51.505, -0.09] const locations = this.props.locations&&this.props.locations.length>0? this.props.locations.map(loc =>{ let location = return location; }): null; return
